description.value:
To a human observer, a Krava appears as a cow, from dairy to more exotic breeds, possibly exotically colored. Like ponies, they come in all the hues one can find in the rainbow, and a few that aren't. They are small as cows go, roughly the size of a pony, though some can grow to the full and proper size and weight of their unintelligent cousins. They often wear collars and ornament their ears and horns with jewelry. Those born or accustomed to city life will also dress themselves properly, though rural ones will often go without, seeing little purpose in it. Horns can grow on male or female Krava, though it is more common in males of maturity and females advanced to their elder years.

Krava Mechanics

Hit Points 6

Size Medium

Speed 30 feet

Ability Boosts Constitution, Charisma, Free

Ability Flaw Dexterity

Languages Common, Sylvan

Additional Languages equal to your Intelligence modifier (if positive). Choose from Aquan, Auran, Elven, Gnomish, Ignan, Terran, and any other languages to which you have access (such as the languages prevalent in your region).

Senses Low-Light Vision

Fingerless While you can make full use of magic items that would rest on the hands (becoming anklets) and feet (becoming a set of four instead of two to cover all four hooves), you have no hands. Your mouth serves as a single hand, preventing you from using two-handed weapons. You can perform somatic components with gestures of your face and/or movement of your hooves.

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition
